title: Oxfordshire Live: Severe accident on A420 - BBC News
summary: driver arrested after seven-vehicle crash on a420 near faringdon .
two in hospital with serious injuries ; one taken by air ambulance .
three further people treated at scene .
road closed both ways ; four-mile tailbacks .

documents.title: that 's all for today
text: thanks for reading today .
we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 with more news , sport , weather and travel from around oxfordshire .

documents.title: 'no plans ' for oxford health trust merger
text: oxford health nhs foundation trust has denied reports that there are plans to merge oxfed and oxford university hospitals .
this is contrary to a report in the oxford mail , based on a letter sent to commissioners in september to form an accountable care organisation .

the trust said `` we remain at an early stage in our discussions about developing more joined up nhs care across oxfordshire - there is no plan to launch a new accountable care organisation ( aco ) at the end of march , although it remains one of a range of options . ''

documents.title: report into oxford health inequalities 'only the first step '
text: a report launched today by the oxfordshire commission on health inequalities has been described as the first of many steps in improving the health of vulnerable people in the area .
the report recommends a coordinated approach from local government , nhs and voluntary organisations in tackling inequalities in healthcare .
dr joe mcmanners , vice chair of oxfordshire health and wellbeing board said `` we need to make sure this is maintained at the top of the agenda and keep up the momentum . ''

documents.title: new greenbelt homes plan opposed by campaigners
text: brian wood , chairman of the oxfordshire branch of the campaign to protect rural england , has said his group is against plans to built about 1,500 homes on the county 's greenbelt .
he said : `` we oppose building on the greenbelt in principle and we do n't think the exceptional circumstances required have been met .
`` the whole point of the greenbelt is that it is a permanent barrier to stop the sprawl of the city of oxford and protect the setting of the city .
`` once you start bits off the whole system falls apart . ''

documents.title: 'jihadi jack ' parents deny funding terror
text: 'jihadi jack ' parents deny funding terror

documents.title: plans to build 13,000 new homes in oxfordshire approved
text: part one of the vale of the white horse district council 's local plan has been approved by the planning inspectorate .
the council plans to build 13,000 homes in the next 15 years , finishing in 2031 .
the planning inspectorate approved the plans `` subject to modifications '' and the final version is expected to be passed by the full council on december 15 .

leader of vale of white horse district council matthew barber said after a process that has taken several years and has seen communities across the vale contributing to the local plan we are now in a position to have much greater control over all development in the vale . ''

documents.title: travel update : broken down vehicles causing queues
text: on the a34 there are two broken down vehicles northbound around the kidlington junction , which is causing traffic to queue from the peartree roundabout .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: travel : a420 open again after earlier collision
text: update : a420 open again after this morning 's seven-vehicle collision # faringdon

documents.title: chances being missed to narrow achievement gap between children in care and their peers
text: researchers from oxford university and the family and childcare trust have warned that children in care are falling well behind children in the general population .
their report shows that high quality early education vastly improves outcomes for disadvantaged children .
it suggests that local authorities , who already monitor and support the education of looked after children at school , should be legally responsible for their early years education as well .
it also calls for better data monitoring on whether children in care are receiving free , high quality early education .

we know that the gap between disadvantaged children and their peers starts well before primary school , and that good quality early years provision can act as a powerful intervention to help narrow this gap .
many children in care have such a tough start in life ; i can think of few groups for whom access to good quality early years education is more important .

documents.title: breaking'jihadi jack ' parents deny funding terrorism
text: the parents of the muslim convert known as `` jihadi jack '' have denied funding terrorism by sending him money .
john letts and sally lane , of chilswell , oxford , are accused of sending hundreds of pounds to 20-year-old jack letts , who is believed to have joined islamic state in 2014 .
mr. letts , 56 , and ms lane , 54 , denied three counts of funding terrorism by allegedly sending their son £ 223 on september 2 last year , £ 1,000 on december 31 and £ 500 on january 4 .
ms lane is also charged with two counts of attempting to send payments of £ 500 on january 4 .
s
he was not asked to enter pleas on those two counts during a hearing at the old bailey .
the couple are due to stand trial at the same court on 9 january .

documents.title: bystery solved ?
text: yesterday we brought you a story about a mysterious building at the former raf bicester airfield , which historic england is asking people to help identify .
now we might be one step closer to bringing you the answer , after jenny king , 78 , spoke to bbc oxford 's kat orman .
she said her 90-year-old neighbor knows the site well and told her it `` might have been where the bomb dump was '' .
mrs king said another theory her friend had was : `` it might have been where the gun was below the ground and only the bit above the ground was the turret of the gun . ''

documents.title: a420 still closed after seven-vehicle crash
text: the a420 remains closed at faringdon and traffic is queuing in both directions after this morning 's seven vehicle accident .
the road is expected to reopen at about 14:00 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: a420 will be closed until 2pm because of crash
text: the a420 has been closed while emergency services are at the scene .
drivers are advised to avoid the area .
the road is expected to re-open at around 2pm .
author: ITV

documents.title: cat rehomed after four years
text: a cat that had been at the oxfordshire animal sanctuary for four years has been rehomed .
henry the cat was described as `` shy '' by volunteers at the sanctuary and is on lifelong medication , therefore it was tough to find an owner willing to accept him .
but according to the refuge centre the moggy approached his new owners , and is getting along famously in his new home .
his owner ashley has set up an instagram account where you can follow his adventures .

documents.title: seven-vehicle pile-up injures five
text: seven-vehicle pile-up injures five

documents.title: breakingdriver arrested after seven-car pile-up
text: the driver of a lorry involved in a crash which caused a seven-car pile-up on the a420 has been arrested .
five people sustained injuries ; one man was airlifted to oxford 's john radcliffe hospital and is in a serious , but not life-threatening , condition .
thames valley police are continuing to make investigations and the road between watchfield and faringdon remains closed .
author: Alex Regan
South Online

documents.title: frosty scenes from university parks
text: yesterday was the coldest day so far this season , with temperatures in oxford getting below -5c .
physicist and avid photographer bethan white used the opportunity to catch some wonderful scenes from university parks early in the morning .

documents.title: travel update : a420 still closed after earlier crash
text: the crash on the a420 is causing major issues in the faringdon area , here 's what we know so far :
author: Al Ryan
BBC Oxford travel presenter

documents.title: pictures : a420 crash causing four-mile tailbacks
text: we 've heard that a royal mail lorry hit several cars on the a420 this morning near faringdon , according to south central ambulance .
two people were seriously injured .
our reporter , matt graveling , is at the scene and has sent these

documents.title: breakinga420 crash : royal mail lorry 'hit several vehicles '
text: a royal mail lorry hit several vehicles in this morning a420 crash , according to south central ambulance .
a man in his 20s , who was driving a toyota yaris , has been airlifted to the john radcliffe hospital in oxford with serious chest and leg injuries , but they are not thought to be life-threatening .
a man , in his 50s , driving a bmw has also been taken to the oxford hospital .
his injuries are also not life-threatening .
three other patients were treated and discharged on the scene .
author: Alex Regan
South Online

documents.title: today 's weather : cold but sunny
text: we 've got some freezing fog around at the moment , but it should clear up and there are plenty of sunny spells with highs of 6c .
into tonight some frost will form but there 'll be some cloud so it 'll be patchier , with highs of 3c overnight .

documents.title: travel update : massive issues on a420
text: we 've been hearing a lot this morning about a seven-vehicle crash on the a420 between watchfield and faringdon .
there is severe congestion on coxwell road , park road , london road and marlborough road .
currently there are 50-minute delays and here are the diversions at the moment :
author: Al Ryan
BBC Oxford travel presenter

documents.title: seven-vehicle pile-up injures three
text: three people are injured in a seven-vehicle pile-up on the a420 near the oxfordshire-wiltshire border .

documents.title: three injured , one serious , in seven-vehicle pile-up
text: it is three people who have been injured in the a420 crash , the ambulance service tells us .
one of the casualties is in a serious condition , and the air ambulance is in attendance , south central ambulance service says .
there are currently delays of 50 minutes and the road is closed in both directions , traffic is being diverted via faringdon

documents.title: air ambulance arrives at a420 crash
text: the thames valley air ambulance has just arrived at the scene of a crash on the a420 near faringdon .
at least one lorry is involved in the seven-vehicle pile-up
the road , on the oxfordshire and wiltshire border , has been closed in both directions .
there are currently delays of 40 minutes for traffic between swindon and oxford ; traffic is being diverted through faringdon .
author: Alex Regan
South Online

documents.title: breakingseven-vehicle pile-up on a420 around faringdon
text: emergency services are dealing with a seven-car pile-up on the a420 between watchfield and faringdon .
two people are known to be trapped in a car and two others are being treated for minor injuries by an ambulance .
at least one lorry is involved .
author: Alex Regan

documents.title: it 's the final countdown to christmas
text: welcome to today 's oxfordshire live page on 1 december .
i 'm contractually obliged to bring some festive cheer .
we 've got to the last month of the year and it 's the beginning of advent so let 's get some christmas spirit on ; mull some things , sing east 17 classics etc .
we 'll be bringing you all the latest news , travel , weather and sport from across the county .
thanks to everyone who 's already sent in their for the oxfordshire 's big picture , keep them coming .
anthony morris has sent a rather lovely of a crystal web from his house in farmoor .
do n't forget to send your of the cold snap this week by email .
author: Alex Regan
South Online
